name: USNWCTrailsStatus
0:
”Alexa, load trails at whitewater”
”Alexa, start trails at whitewater”
”Alexa, launch trails at whitewater”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trails at white water
des:
Want to access the trails when you visit the USNWC in Charlotte, NC? This skill checks the center's twitter acct for trail status every 15 minutes for any updates. Checking this skills ensures you will know if the trails are open or closed before your visit to the USNWC.

You can say:

"Alexa, open trails at whitewater"
"Alexa, ask trails at whitewater"
"Alexa, load trails at whitewater"

This skill was built with love by VoiceApps.com. Visit us to create your own skill in minutes!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
